overview: Following the destruction of her city, Elenka sets out on a long journey for help from her Goddess. Through rain and snow, crossing rivers and scavenging for food. Elenka struggles to survive. As all hope seems lost, she is discovered by a soldier, one who helped attack her city. Will he help save her, or will she be his next victim? Elenka's Quest is just beginning...
title: Elenka's Quest
